name: Barfly: Drinking games
description:
What will you choose: truth or sips?
Fun drinking games you can play with your buddies.

Find out some of our tasks:
- Give a drink to a random person in the bar. Take 10 sips if you fail.
- Being silent, use gestures so other players can guess "Toilet made of diamonds"
- Post the most receent photo on your phone on Instagram. If you do it — everyone takes a sip. If you forfeit — you take 5 sips.
- Anyone who has ever eaten pet food takes 2 sips.
- If you've ever had sex in your parents' bed take 2 sips.
- If you've ever cheated on your partner take 5 sips.

Hope you have a good party, folks! Stay safe ;)
